comments.body:
Could you explain your requirement a little more please.

I am confused as you seem to be implying this is for the Tomcat log files but
those are not available via http.

No, I just mean log files in general. The ".log" extension is a fairly common
extension, so I was asking for the default support for that. That's all.
This has been fixed in 7.0.x by aligning Tomcat's MIME mappings with httpd's. I don't this this being back-ported.

description:
Default conf/web.xml doesn't contain an entry for the .log files, but those
files are most often text/plain.

I think it would be good to add this to the current list of default MIME type
mapping.
summary: Add MIME type mapping for the "log" extension
